name: Grid Cell and Subgrid Registration
description: Register horizontal grid cells and subgrid together
title: [EMD] Grid Cell and Subgrid:

field_guidance.grid_type: How cells are distributed over the region. Most common: regular-latitude-longitude, reduced-gaussian, tripolar, cubed-sphere.
field_guidance.cell_variable_type: Types of variables at this subgrid location. mass: thermodynamic quantities, x-velocity/y-velocity: velocity components, velocity: full vector for unstructured grids.
